text: The 1950 British Grand Prix held at Silverstone was Round 1 of 7 in the 1950 Formula One Season. Giuseppe Farina took Pole and the Race Win for Alfa Romeo. == Qualifying == Pos No Driver Constructor Time Gap 1 2 Giuseppe Farina Alfa Romeo 1:50.8 – 2 3 Luigi Fagioli Alfa Romeo 1:51.0 + 0.2 3 1
